lead_paragraph: “I know there are some bad ones in here, but this is the last time I’m doing this, so we’re not leaving any room for leftovers,” he said to some laughter.
snippet: “I know there are some bad ones in here, but this is the last time I’m doing this, so we’re not leaving any room for leftovers,” he said to some laughter....

headline.main: Obama Lets Bad Puns Fly at Turkey Pardoning Tinged With Sadness
